item.title: Grants
item.description: Ex ante and ex post grant evaluation

item.title: Granting And Policy Evaluation For Musicians In Hungary
item.description: The data and intelligence of CEEMID was used in Hungary to create an ex ante evaluation of the new Cseh Tam√°s Program to support popular music development in Hungary. Our mandate was to create concrete granting proposals that have a high chance of making a change in terms of the later royalty earning capabilities of artists.
